Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: very large black triangle shape ufo, hovering, silent, no noise. bright light like it was looking for something. change direction when we drove up to it, flew away slowly.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving from dropping a friend off, it was about 12:30am, bennets corner rd, elbridge NY. We are only ones on the road. there were three of us in the car. My sister saw this bright light and when we got closer, yelled "Oh my god, a UFO!" we looked out the window and sure enough looked like a large black triangle ufo. we stopped the car in the middle of the road and just stared in shock. we rolled window down and didnt even here a noise. it was low to ground, probably could throw a rock at it and hit it. it then seemed like it saw us and quickly turned 180degrees and went slowly in the sky still low over the road, it the oppisite direction of us. we were too scared to follow it or to call police.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Elbridge
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
